item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Sunday, September 8, 2024 at 5:10 PM UTC
item.description:

4. LibrePythonista allows running IPython code in a LibreOffice spreadsheet (48 points | 5 comments)

6. Infisical (YC W23) Is Hiring a Developer Who Love Writing ( | hide)
7. Nikon sold more Z9 cameras in its first year than any flagship in past 15 years (31 points | 12 comments)

14. Going Buildless (22 points | 9 comments)

23. A new rare high-rank elliptic curve, and an orchard of Diophantine equations (190 points | 17 comments)
24. The "email is authentication" pattern (263 points | 362 comments)
25. Beyond Ctrl-C: The dark corners of Unix signal handling (138 points | 48 comments)
26. Appalachian Trail Hiker Photo Archive (136 points | 29 comments)

29. Early science and stone engineering in Menga, a Neolithic dolmen (26 points | 1 comment)
